long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
yet another extension for pixilart dot com. 
this one adds a page for viewing and editing all of your posts, drawings, and media in one place. once installed, you can access this page at pixilart.com/mass-post-editor/.
